title: IIFL Finance to receive $200 mn liquidity support from Fairfax after RBI ban
description: IIFL Finance announces a $200 million liquidity support from top shareholder Fairfax India, following the Reserve Bank of India's directive to halt gold loan disbursals, causing liquidity concerns. Fairfax India, with a 15% stake, expresses confidence in IIFL's management.
